mapper.select: SELECT A.feed_comment_id AS feedCommentId , A.comment , B.user_id AS writerUserId , IF(B.nick_name IS NULL, B.uid, B.nick_name) AS writerNm , B.pic AS writerPic FROM feed_comments A INNER JOIN user B ON A.user_id = B.user_id WHERE A.feed_id = #{feedId} ORDER BY A.feed_comment_id DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}
